summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Sections 23.44.017, 23.55.020, 23.55.022, 23.78.002, 23.78.010, 23.79.004, 23.79.008 of the Seattle Municipal Code to amend the development standards for Public Schools and to update the Public School Departure and School Joint Use and Reuse Advisory Processes.
